item.description: Missy graduated from Harvard College in 2019 with a degree in psychology. At Harvard, Missyâ€™s research focused on disordered eating and youth/adolescent mental health. Now, Missy is a clinical research coordinator, working with Drs. Jenny Thomas and Kamryn Eddy, at the Eating Disorders Clinical & Research Program at Massachusetts General Hospital. Missy plans to pursue a Ph.D. in clinical psychology.
